lyrics:
62 contributorsheaven lyricsproduced by boots  beyoncé knowles

verse 1
i fought for you the hardest
it made me the strongest
so tell me your secrets

chorus
but heaven couldnt wait for you
no heaven couldnt wait for you
heaven couldnt wait for you no
no heaven couldnt wait for you
so go on go home

we laughed at the darkness

chorus
heaven couldnt wait for you
heaven couldnt wait for you
oh heaven couldnt wait for you
no heaven couldnt wait for you you you you you you
no heaven couldnt wait for you no
heaven couldnt wait for you no
heaven couldnt wait for you oh
heaven couldnt wait for you
so go on go home
so go on go home

padre nuestro que estás en el cielo
